vote.title: Authorize a six-month extension of the option-period deadline with respect to the Option Agreement previously authorized by Resolution No. 20-1037, on June 24, 2020, and executed January 27, 2021, with Refuge City of Dallas “Refuge” for the development of city-owned property located at 12000 Greenville Avenue, Dallas, Dallas County, Texas from August 13, 2021 to February 14, 2022 - Financing: No cost consideration to the City
